extendedInfo.description: Once upon a time there was a lovely forest where the balloons made a big party. They were far too noisy and made a big mess. Harry the hedgehog, Willy the warthog and Dany the dodo decided to make the Evil Balloons go away!While you are playing you can complete challenging tiers, or just enjoy the run in the freeplay at three different difficulty level!Get all achievement and reach the top of the highscore ladder!âââHOW TO PLAYââââTap the right side of the screen to jumpâTap and hold to bigger jumpâTap again to double jumpâPop the balloons in the air to unlock new challenges but beware the obstacles on the ground!
